content: the spike cluster stitch afghan is a captivating crochet pattern that will challenge your skills and result in a stunning finished piece the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through each step making it accessible to a wide range of crocheters with customization options for different sizes included you can create a unique afghan that fits your preferences this afghan is as cozy as it is visually striking get ready to dive into this engaging project and create a timeless piece that will be cherished for years to come **unique features-** intermediate level pattern interesting spike cluster stitch design written instructions and captioned right and left-handed video tutorials included includes sizing for baby blankets to cal kings
